title: An essay on wool and wollen manufacture for the improvement of trade, to the benefit of landlords, feeders of sheep, clothiers, and merchands, in a letter to a member of Parliament.
author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699.
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Attributed to Sir Josiah Child. cf. NUC pre-1956.
